meanings.meaning_en_US: To reach someone or something that is ahead.

examples.sentence: I need to [catch up with] my studies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要追上我的學業。

examples.sentence: She finally [caught up with] her friends after the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議後她終於追上了她的朋友。

examples.sentence: He tried to [catch up with] the latest news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試著追上最新的消息。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To pursue someone or something.

examples.sentence: You should [go after] your dreams.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該追求你的夢想。

examples.sentence: The police decided to [go after] the suspect.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 警方決定追捕嫌疑犯。

examples.sentence: She plans to [go after] a promotion at work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她計劃在工作中追求升遷。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To stay at the same speed or level as someone or something.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 與某人或某事物保持相同的速度或水平

examples.sentence: It's hard to [keep pace with] the rapid changes in technology.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 很難跟上科技的快速變化。

examples.sentence: She managed to [keep pace with] the runners during the marathon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在馬拉松中，她成功地與跑者保持了同速。

examples.sentence: They need to [keep pace with] industry standards to stay competitive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們需要跟上行業標準以保持競爭力。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have a significant impact or effect.

examples.sentence: Your donation can [make a difference] in the lives of many.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你的捐款能在許多人生活中產生重要影響。

examples.sentence: We need to find ways to [make a difference] for the environment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要找出對環境產生影響的方法。

examples.sentence: He believes that education can [make a difference] in society.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他相信教育能在社會中產生重要影響。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To present or propose something.

examples.sentence: She decided to [put forth] a new proposal at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定在會議上提出一個新提案。

examples.sentence: He always [puts forth] innovative ideas during discussions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在討論中總是提出創新的想法。

examples.sentence: They [put forth] their best effort to complete the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們全力以赴地完成這個項目。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To chase or pursue someone or something.

examples.sentence: The dog loves to [run after] the ball.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這隻狗喜歡追逐球。

examples.sentence: She decided to [run after] her lost opportunity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定追逐她失去的機會。

examples.sentence: He often [runs after] success in his career.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他常常追求職業上的成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To take care of someone or something.

examples.sentence: Can you [see after] the kids while I am out?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能在我外出時照顧孩子們嗎？

examples.sentence: He [saw after] the project from start to finish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他從頭到尾都在照顧這個項目。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [see after] the arrangements for the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保照顧好活動的安排。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To investigate or understand something.

examples.sentence: The company will [see into] the matter thoroughly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司將徹底調查此事。

examples.sentence: I need to [see into] the report before making a decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在做出決定之前，我需要檢查報告。

examples.sentence: He is trying to [see into] her feelings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試著理解她的感受。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To accompany someone to the exit or end.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 陪伴某人到出口或結束

examples.sentence: Please [see me out] when I leave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我離開時請你陪我出去。

examples.sentence: He [saw her out] after the party ended.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 派對結束後，他陪她到出口。

examples.sentence: I will [see you out] when your meeting is done.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 等你的會議結束時，我會陪你出去。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To function in a particular role.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 在特定角色中發揮作用

examples.sentence: He will [serve as] the team leader during the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他將在這個項目中擔任團隊領導。

examples.sentence: This room [serves as] our conference area.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個房間作為我們的會議區。

examples.sentence: They [serve as] a good example for others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們成為了他人的好榜樣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To behave in a way that others can learn from.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 以別人可以學習的方式行為

examples.sentence: Teachers should [set a good example] for their students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教師應該為他們的學生樹立好榜樣。

examples.sentence: He always [sets a good example] in his work ethic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在工作態度上總是樹立好榜樣。

examples.sentence: Parents need to [set a good example] for their children.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 父母需要為他們的孩子樹立好榜樣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To start working or preparing for something.

examples.sentence: They [set to] work immediately after the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議後他們立即開始工作。

examples.sentence: She [set to] preparing for her exams last month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她上個月開始為考試做準備。

examples.sentence: He is [set to] launch the new product next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他定於下週推出新產品。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To spring forth or emerge suddenly.

examples.sentence: The cat [shot out] from under the couch when it saw the mouse.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當貓咪看到老鼠時，從沙發下快速跳出來。

examples.sentence: Ideas [shot out] during the brainstorming session.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在頭腦風暴會議中，靈感不斷湧現。

examples.sentence: She [shot out] of the room when she heard the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她聽到消息時，立即衝出房間。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To waste time by being idle.

examples.sentence: Don't just [sit about] all day; find something to do.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別整天閒著不做事，要找些事情做。

examples.sentence: He spent the afternoon [sitting around] with his friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他下午和朋友們一起遊蕩。

examples.sentence: They like to [sit about] at the park and do nothing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們喜歡在公園裡悠閒無所事事。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To relax and not worry about things.

examples.sentence: It's time to [sit back] and enjoy the show.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 是時候放鬆心情，享受表演了。

examples.sentence: He likes to [sit back] with a good book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡放鬆地看一本好書。

examples.sentence: You should [sit back] and let others help you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該放鬆，讓其他人幫助你。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To begin to eat or do something.

examples.sentence: Let's [sit down to] dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 讓我們開始吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: She [sat down to] work on her project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她開始著手進行她的項目。

examples.sentence: After some time, they finally [sat down to] discuss the agreement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 經過一段時間，他們終於開始討論協議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To attend a meeting or class without being an official member.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 參加會議或課程而不成為正式成員

examples.sentence: I plan to [sit in] on the workshop this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我打算這個週末旁聽研討會。

examples.sentence: He [sat in] on the class to learn more about the subject.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他旁聽了這門課，以便更了解這個主題。

examples.sentence: They invited guests to [sit in] on the discussion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們邀請客人旁聽討論。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To sit upright, especially after lying down.

examples.sentence: After the long nap, she decided to [sit up].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小憩過後，她決定坐起來。

examples.sentence: He [sat up] quickly when he heard the alarm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他聽到警報時，他迅速坐起來。

examples.sentence: You need to [sit up] straight for good posture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要坐直以保持良好的姿勢。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To omit or not address something.

examples.sentence: He decided to [skip over] the difficult questions in the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定在考試中跳過難題。

examples.sentence: Don't [skip over] the important details in your report.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在報告中不要忽略重要細節。

examples.sentence: She [skipped over] that chapter in the book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她跳過了書中的那一章。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Even to the slight extent of.

examples.sentence: I won't [so much as] look at you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我甚至不會瞧你一眼。

examples.sentence: He didn't [so much as] say goodbye.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他甚至連再見都不說。

examples.sentence: She wouldn't [so much as] consider the offer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她甚至不會考慮這個提議。
